name: Project 06
description: Installs Project 06 from a zip file
notes: -Comes with a DXVK cache for a stutter free experience! (DXVK cache made with demo 2) -The wine virtual desktop is enabled so that you can alt+tab freely. You may disable it if you wish, but if you alt+tab the game will refuse any inputs until relaunch. -Downloads can be found from the youtube video descriptions of this youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPcCzJ5G4tHG4PQRnZXc4Qw

files.gamezip: N/A:Please select the Project 06 zip file

content:
files:
- gamezip: N/A:Please select the Project 06 zip file
- cache: https://github.com/Cervoxx/DXVKCACHE/raw/master/project-06-cache.tar.xz
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/project_06/Sonic the Hedgehog.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/project_06
    src: gamezip
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: cache
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
